title: Storytelling & Sequence
description: Learn how to tell stories and describe sequence naturally.

steps.teacher: 一開始，一切都比我想的順利。
expected_answer: 一開始，一切都比我想的順利。
steps.pinyin: yì kāi shǐ, yí qiè dōu bǐ wǒ xiǎng de shùn lì.
steps.english_hint: At first, everything went smoother than I expected.

steps.teacher: 接著，事情慢慢變得複雜。
expected_answer: 接著，事情慢慢變得複雜。
steps.pinyin: jiē zhe, shì qíng màn màn biàn de fù zá.

steps.teacher: 途中我遇到幾個意想不到的問題。
expected_answer: 途中我遇到幾個意想不到的問題。
steps.pinyin: tú zhōng wǒ yù dào jǐ gè yì xiǎng bù dào de wèn tí.
steps.english_hint: Along the way, I ran into a few unexpected problems.

steps.teacher: 幸好我有提前準備，所以沒有太慌張。
expected_answer: 幸好我有提前準備，所以沒有太慌張。
steps.pinyin: xìng hǎo wǒ yǒu tí qián zhǔn bèi, suǒ yǐ méi yǒu tài huāng zhāng.
steps.english_hint: Luckily, I prepared in advance, so I didn’t panic.

steps.teacher: 後來我找到一個更有效的方式處理。
expected_answer: 後來我找到一個更有效的方式處理。
steps.pinyin: hòu lái wǒ zhǎo dào yí gè gèng yǒu xiào de fāng shì chǔ lǐ.
steps.english_hint: Later, I found a more effective way to handle it.

steps.teacher: 最後，事情比我預期的更快解決。
expected_answer: 最後，事情比我預期的更快解決。
steps.pinyin: zuì hòu, shì qíng bǐ wǒ yù qī de gèng kuài jiě jué.
steps.english_hint: In the end, things were solved faster than I expected.

steps.teacher: 整體來說，這次經驗讓我學到不少。
expected_answer: 整體來說，這次經驗讓我學到不少。
steps.pinyin: zhěng tǐ lái shuō, zhè cì jīng yàn ràng wǒ xué dào bù shǎo.
steps.english_hint: Overall, I learned a lot from this experience.

steps.teacher: 如果再來一次，我會用更好的方式處理。
expected_answer: 如果再來一次，我會用更好的方式處理。
steps.pinyin: rú guǒ zài lái yí cì, wǒ huì yòng gèng hǎo de fāng shì chǔ lǐ.
steps.english_hint: If it happened again, I’d handle it better.

steps.teacher: 這件事讓我更有信心面對困難。
expected_answer: 這件事讓我更有信心面對困難。
steps.pinyin: zhè jiàn shì ràng wǒ gèng yǒu xìn xīn miàn duì kùn nán.
steps.english_hint: This made me more confident facing challenges.

steps.teacher: 也因為這樣，我變得更能冷靜處理問題。
expected_answer: 也因為這樣，我變得更能冷靜處理問題。
steps.pinyin: yě yīn wèi zhè yàng, wǒ biàn de gèng néng lěng jìng chǔ lǐ wèn tí.
steps.english_hint: Because of this, I became better at dealing with problems calmly.

review.summary: You learned natural sequencing & storytelling at B1.
